knimeNode.name: Sum Formula
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to generate molecular formulas based on a given mass input.

fullDescription.intro:
Generates sum formulas based on a given mass. The formula generator assumes input masses to be major isotopic masses.
The 'valid sum' of the generated sum formulas is also computed. It ranges between 0 and 1 indicating if any of the applied rules for evaluating the validity of a formula has been violated. Rules used are 'ElementRule', 'MMElementRule', 'NitrogenRule', and 'RDBERule' (defined in CDK API). All rule parameters are set to default. 'Exclusion' keeps only formulas with a valid sum of 1.
DISABLED Options: 'All elements' and 'Exclude elements' are currently not supported because the matrix required for the calculation exceeds the memory limit of the virtual machine: Math.pow(2, size).
fullDescription.option: Whether to use all elements for the calculation.
Whether to use a custom set of elements.
Whether to use all elements excluding a set of elements.
The comma-separated set of elements to be included or excluded.
Remove sum formulas that violate one or more of the rules.

ports.outPort: Input table plus calculated sum formulas.
